mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gbj_user_buy_comments( id, user_id, parent_id, child_id, content, comment_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{parentId}, #{childId}, #{content}, #{commentTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gbj_user_buy_comments SET user_id = #{user.id}, parent_id = #{parentId}, child_id = #{childId}, content = #{content}, comment_time = #{commentTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
